alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns, southeastern Marion and eastern Putnam Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Picolata to near Emeralda. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, East Palatka and Saint Augustine Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
